title: The resurreccion of the masse with the wonderful vertues of the same, newly set forth vnto the greate hartes ease, ioye and comforte of all the catholykes, by Hughe Hilarie. (?)
author: Hilarie, Hughe.
publicationPlace: Imprynted at Strasburgh [i.e. Wesel?] in Elsas :
publicationDate: in the moneth of Auguste. the yeare of our Lord. 1554.
publisher: At the signe of the golde[n] Bibell [by J. Lambrecht? for H. Singleton],
